resources.string: Your swipe app preferences are empty. Would you like to set a default swipe behaviour now?
"Your current default swipe action is set to %1$s\n\nTo reset the preferences and set a different swipe action, please click RESET"

"Your swipe default app was set to %1$s.

To confirm press OK.

To choose a different app press RESET"

"Your swipe default shortcut was set to %1$s.

To confirm press OK.

To choose a different app press RESET"
To set custom shortcut, click the button below:
Or choose an app from the list:

"This application was developed by 6ThGear team to allow you to set custom action to the swipe feature of TW Launcher. 
As a standalone app it will have no effect whatsoever on your built in launcher. It needs to be modded into the TW Launcher application by your rom developer. 
If this app was included in the rom you're using, chances are your TW Launcher is modded accordingly and once you set a custom action, your launcher's swipe feature will display it. 
We hope you enjoy our little contribution to the android development comunity 
6thGear Team: Wuby986 and Daxgirl"
